verses.verse: וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶׁ֔ה <WH4872> unto Moses פְּסָל־ <WH6458> Hew לְךָ֛ שְׁנֵֽי־ <WH8147> thee two לֻחֹ֥ת <WH3871> tables אֲבָנִ֖ים <WH68> of stone כָּרִאשֹׁנִ֑ים <WH7223> like unto the first וְכָתַבְתִּי֙ <WH3789> and I will write עַל־ <WH5921> on הַלֻּחֹ֔ת <WH3871> upon [these] tables אֶת־ <WH853> הַדְּבָרִ֔ים <WH1697> the words אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which הָי֛וּ <WH1961> become עַל־ <WH5921> and הַלֻּחֹ֥ת <WH3871> tables הָרִאשֹׁנִ֖ים <WH7223> that were in the first אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which שִׁבַּֽרְתָּ׃ <WH7665> which thou brakest

וֶהְיֵ֥ה <WH1961> become נָכ֖וֹן <WH3559> And be ready לַבֹּ֑קֶר <WH1242> in the morning וְעָלִ֤יתָ <WH5927> and come up בַבֹּ֙קֶר֙ <WH1242> in the morning אֶל־ <WH413> to הַ֣ר <WH2022> unto mount סִינַ֔י <WH5514> Sinai וְנִצַּבְתָּ֥ <WH5324> and present לִ֛י שָׁ֖ם <WH8033> there עַל־ <WH5921> unto רֹ֥אשׁ <WH7218> thyself there to me in the top הָהָֽר׃ <WH2022> of the mount

וְאִישׁ֙ <WH376> And no man לֹֽא־ <WH3808> No יַעֲלֶ֣ה <WH5927> shall come up עִמָּ֔ךְ <WH5973> let וְגַם־ <WH1571> any אִ֥ישׁ <WH376> let any man אַל־ <WH408> with thee neither יֵרָ֖א <WH7200> be seen בְּכָל־ <WH3605> anywhere הָהָ֑ר <WH2022> throughout all the mount גַּם־ <WH1571> even הַצֹּ֤אן <WH6629> neither let the flocks וְהַבָּקָר֙ <WH1241> nor herds אַל־ <WH408> nor יִרְע֔וּ <WH7462> feed אֶל־ <WH413> in מ֖וּל <WH4136> before הָהָ֥ר <WH2022> that mount הַהֽוּא׃ <WH1931> he

וַיִּפְסֹ֡ל <WH6458> And he hewed שְׁנֵֽי־ <WH8147> two לֻחֹ֨ת <WH3871> tables אֲבָנִ֜ים <WH68> of stone כָּרִאשֹׁנִ֗ים <WH7223> like unto the first וַיַּשְׁכֵּ֨ם <WH7925> rose up early מֹשֶׁ֤ה <WH4872> and Moses בַבֹּ֙קֶר֙ <WH1242> in the morning וַיַּ֙עַל֙ <WH5927> and went up אֶל־ <WH413> to הַ֣ר <WH2022> unto mount סִינַ֔י <WH5514> Sinai כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <WH834> after צִוָּ֥ה <WH6680> had commanded יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> as the LORD אֹת֑וֹ <WH853> וַיִּקַּ֣ח <WH3947> him and took בְּיָד֔וֹ <WH3027> in his hand שְׁנֵ֖י <WH8147> the two לֻחֹ֥ת <WH3871> tables אֲבָנִֽים׃ <WH68> of stone

וַיֵּ֤רֶד <WH3381> descended יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> And the LORD בֶּֽעָנָ֔ן <WH6051> in the cloud וַיִּתְיַצֵּ֥ב <WH3320> and stood עִמּ֖וֹ <WH5973> with שָׁ֑ם <WH8033> there וַיִּקְרָ֥א <WH7121> with him there and proclaimed בְשֵׁ֖ם <WH8034> the name יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> of the LORD

וַיַּעֲבֹ֨ר <WH5674> passed by יְהוָ֥ה ׀ <WH3068> And the LORD עַל־ <WH5921> in פָּנָיו֮ <WH6440> before him וַיִּקְרָא֒ <WH7121> and proclaimed יְהוָ֣ה ׀ <WH3068> The LORD יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> The LORD אֵ֥ל <WH410> God רַח֖וּם <WH7349> merciful וְחַנּ֑וּן <WH2587> and gracious אֶ֥רֶךְ <WH750> slow אַפַּ֖יִם <WH639> to anger וְרַב־ <WH7227> and abundant חֶ֥סֶד <WH2617> in goodness וֶאֱמֶֽת׃ <WH571> and truth

נֹצֵ֥ר <WH5341> Keeping חֶ֙סֶד֙ <WH2617> mercy לָאֲלָפִ֔ים <WH505> for thousands נֹשֵׂ֥א <WH5375> forgiving עָוֹ֛ן <WH5771> iniquity וָפֶ֖שַׁע <WH6588> and transgression וְחַטָּאָ֑ה <WH2403> and sin וְנַקֵּה֙ <WH5352> and that will by no means לֹ֣א <WH3808> no יְנַקֶּ֔ה <WH5352> clear פֹּקֵ֣ד ׀ <WH6485> [the guilty] visiting עֲוֹ֣ן <WH5771> the iniquity אָב֗וֹת <WH1> of the fathers עַל־ <WH5921> on בָּנִים֙ <WH1121> upon the children וְעַל־ <WH5921> and on בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> and upon the children's בָנִ֔ים <WH1121> the children עַל־ <WH5921> unto שִׁלֵּשִׁ֖ים <WH8029> children unto the third וְעַל־ <WH5921> and רִבֵּעִֽים׃ <WH7256> and to the fourth
וַיְמַהֵ֖ר <WH4116> made haste מֹשֶׁ֑ה <WH4872> And Moses וַיִּקֹּ֥ד <WH6915> and bowed his head אַ֖רְצָה <WH776> toward the earth וַיִּשְׁתָּֽחוּ׃ <WH7812> and worshipped

וַיֹּ֡אמֶר <WH559> And he said אִם־ <WH518> If נָא֩ <WH4994> now מָצָ֨אתִי <WH4672> If now I have found חֵ֤ן <WH2580> grace בְּעֵינֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH5869> in thy sight אֲדֹנָ֔י <WH136> O Lord יֵֽלֶךְ־ <WH1980> go נָ֥א <WH4994> pray אֲדֹנָ֖י <WH136> let my Lord בְּקִרְבֵּ֑נוּ <WH7130> among כִּ֤י <WH3588> even עַם־ <WH5971> people קְשֵׁה־ <WH7186> churlish עֹ֙רֶף֙ <WH6203> stiff-necked ה֔וּא <WH1931> he וְסָלַחְתָּ֛ <WH5545> and pardon לַעֲוֹנֵ֥נוּ <WH5771> our iniquity וּלְחַטָּאתֵ֖נוּ <WH2403> and our sin וּנְחַלְתָּֽנוּ׃ <WH5157> and take us for thine inheritance

וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <WH559> And he said הִנֵּ֣ה <WH2009> Behold אָנֹכִי֮ <WH595> I כֹּרֵ֣ת <WH3772> Behold I make בְּרִית֒ <WH1285> a covenant נֶ֤גֶד <WH5048> Before כָּֽל־ <WH3605> all עַמְּךָ֙ <WH5971> before all thy people אֶעֱשֶׂ֣ה <WH6213> I will do נִפְלָאֹ֔ת <WH6381> marvels אֲשֶׁ֛ר <WH834> which לֹֽא־ <WH3808> nor נִבְרְא֥וּ <WH1254> such as have not been done בְכָל־ <WH3605> all הָאָ֖רֶץ <WH776> in all the earth וּבְכָל־ <WH3605> any הַגּוֹיִ֑ם <WH1471> nor in any nation וְרָאָ֣ה <WH7200> which thou [art] shall see כָל־ <WH3605> and all הָ֠עָם <WH5971> and all the people אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> whom אַתָּ֨ה <WH859> you בְקִרְבּ֜וֹ <WH7130> among אֶת־ <WH853> מַעֲשֵׂ֤ה <WH4639> the work יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> of the LORD כִּֽי־ <WH3588> is a נוֹרָ֣א <WH3372> for it [is] a terrible thing ה֔וּא <WH1931> he אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> whom אֲנִ֖י <WH589> I am עֹשֶׂ֥ה <WH6213> that I will do עִמָּֽךְ׃ <WH5973> be sure

שְׁמָ֨ר־ <WH8104> Observe לְךָ֔ אֵ֛ת <WH853> אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> what אָנֹכִ֖י <WH595> I מְצַוְּךָ֣ <WH6680> thou that which I command הַיּ֑וֹם <WH3117> thee this day הִנְנִ֧י <WH2005> I am going גֹרֵ֣שׁ <WH1644> behold I drive out מִפָּנֶ֗יךָ <WH6440> before אֶת־ <WH853> הָאֱמֹרִי֙ <WH567> thee the Amorite וְהַֽכְּנַעֲנִ֔י <WH3669> and the Canaanite וְהַחִתִּי֙ <WH2850> and the Hittite וְהַפְּרִזִּ֔י <WH6522> and the Perizzite וְהַחִוִּ֖י <WH2340> and the Hivite וְהַיְבוּסִֽי׃ <WH2983> and the Jebusite

הִשָּׁ֣מֶר <WH8104> Take heed לְךָ֗ פֶּן־ <WH6435> no תִּכְרֹ֤ת <WH3772> to thyself lest thou make בְּרִית֙ <WH1285> a covenant לְיוֹשֵׁ֣ב <WH3427> with the inhabitants הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> of the land אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which אַתָּ֖ה <WH859> you בָּ֣א <WH935> whither thou goest עָלֶ֑יהָ <WH5921> and פֶּן־ <WH6435> or יִהְיֶ֥ה <WH1961> will become לְמוֹקֵ֖שׁ <WH4170> lest it be for a snare בְּקִרְבֶּֽךָ׃ <WH7130> in the midst

כִּ֤י <WH3588> for אֶת־ <WH853> מִזְבְּחֹתָם֙ <WH4196> their altars תִּתֹּצ֔וּן <WH5422> But ye shall destroy וְאֶת־ <WH853> מַצֵּבֹתָ֖ם <WH4676> their images תְּשַׁבֵּר֑וּן <WH7665> break וְאֶת־ <WH853> אֲשֵׁרָ֖יו <WH842> their groves תִּכְרֹתֽוּן׃ <WH3772> and cut down

כִּ֛י <WH3588> for לֹ֥א <WH3808> not תִֽשְׁתַּחֲוֶ֖ה <WH7812> For thou shalt worship לְאֵ֣ל <WH410> god אַחֵ֑ר <WH312> no other כִּ֤י <WH3588> for יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> for the LORD קַנָּ֣א <WH7067> [is] Jealous שְׁמ֔וֹ <WH8034> whose name אֵ֥ל <WH410> God קַנָּ֖א <WH7067> [is] a jealous הֽוּא׃ <WH1931> he

פֶּן־ <WH6435> otherwise תִּכְרֹ֥ת <WH3772> Lest thou make בְּרִ֖ית <WH1285> a covenant לְיוֹשֵׁ֣ב <WH3427> with the inhabitants הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> of the land וְזָנ֣וּ ׀ <WH2181> and they go a whoring אַחֲרֵ֣י <WH310> after אֱלֹֽהֵיהֶ֗ם <WH430> their gods וְזָבְחוּ֙ <WH2076> and do sacrifice לֵאלֹ֣הֵיהֶ֔ם <WH430> unto their gods וְקָרָ֣א <WH7121> and [one] call לְךָ֔ וְאָכַלְתָּ֖ <WH398> thee and thou eat מִזִּבְחֽוֹ׃ <WH2077> of his sacrifice

וְלָקַחְתָּ֥ <WH3947> And thou take מִבְּנֹתָ֖יו <WH1323> of their daughters לְבָנֶ֑יךָ <WH1121> unto thy sons וְזָנ֣וּ <WH2181> go a whoring בְנֹתָ֗יו <WH1323> and their daughters אַחֲרֵי֙ <WH310> after אֱלֹ֣הֵיהֶ֔ן <WH430> their gods וְהִזְנוּ֙ <WH2181> go a whoring אֶת־ <WH853> בָּנֶ֔יךָ <WH1121> thy sons אַחֲרֵ֖י <WH310> after אֱלֹהֵיהֶֽן׃ <WH430> their gods
אֱלֹהֵ֥י <WH430> gods מַסֵּכָ֖ה <WH4541> thee no molten לֹ֥א <WH3808> no תַעֲשֶׂה־ <WH6213> Thou shalt make לָּֽךְ׃

אֶת־ <WH853> חַ֣ג <WH2282> The feast הַמַּצּוֹת֮ <WH4682> of unleavened bread תִּשְׁמֹר֒ <WH8104> shalt thou keep שִׁבְעַ֨ת <WH7651> Seven יָמִ֜ים <WH3117> days תֹּאכַ֤ל <WH398> thou shalt eat מַצּוֹת֙ <WH4682> unleavened bread אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> I צִוִּיתִ֔ךָ <WH6680> as I commanded לְמוֹעֵ֖ד <WH4150> thee in the time חֹ֣דֶשׁ <WH2320> of the month הָאָבִ֑יב <WH24> Abib כִּ֚י <WH3588> in בְּחֹ֣דֶשׁ <WH2320> for in the month הָֽאָבִ֔יב <WH24> Abib יָצָ֖אתָ <WH3318> thou camest out מִמִּצְרָֽיִם׃ <WH4714> from Egypt

כָּל־ <WH3605> every פֶּ֥טֶר <WH6363> All that openeth רֶ֖חֶם <WH7358> the matrix לִ֑י וְכָֽל־ <WH3605> and all מִקְנְךָ֙ <WH4735> among thy cattle תִּזָּכָ֔ר <WH2142> [that is male פֶּ֖טֶר <WH6363> [is] mine and every firstling שׁ֥וֹר <WH7794> [whether] ox וָשֶֽׂה׃ <WH7716> or sheep

וּפֶ֤טֶר <WH6363> But the firstling חֲמוֹר֙ <WH2543> of an ass תִּפְדֶּ֣ה <WH6299> thou shalt redeem בְשֶׂ֔ה <WH7716> with a lamb וְאִם־ <WH518> and if לֹ֥א <WH3808> None תִפְדֶּ֖ה <WH6299> and if thou redeem וַעֲרַפְתּ֑וֹ <WH6202> [him] not then shalt thou break his neck כֹּ֣ל <WH3605> all בְּכ֤וֹר <WH1060> All the firstborn בָּנֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH1121> of thy sons תִּפְדֶּ֔ה <WH6299> thou shalt redeem וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> None יֵרָא֥וּ <WH7200> And none shall appear פָנַ֖י <WH6440> before רֵיקָֽם׃ <WH7387> me empty

שֵׁ֤שֶׁת <WH8337> Six יָמִים֙ <WH3117> days תַּעֲבֹ֔ד <WH5647> thou shalt work וּבַיּ֥וֹם <WH3117> day הַשְּׁבִיעִ֖י <WH7637> but on the seventh תִּשְׁבֹּ֑ת <WH7673> thou shalt rest בֶּחָרִ֥ישׁ <WH2758> in earing time וּבַקָּצִ֖יר <WH7105> and in harvest תִּשְׁבֹּֽת׃ <WH7673> thou shalt rest

וְחַ֤ג <WH2282> the feast שָׁבֻעֹת֙ <WH7620> of weeks תַּעֲשֶׂ֣ה <WH6213> And thou shalt observe לְךָ֔ בִּכּוּרֵ֖י <WH1061> of the firstfruits קְצִ֣יר <WH7105> harvest חִטִּ֑ים <WH2406> of wheat וְחַג֙ <WH2282> and the feast הָֽאָסִ֔יף <WH614> of ingathering תְּקוּפַ֖ת <WH8622> end הַשָּׁנָֽה׃ <WH8141> at the year's

שָׁלֹ֥שׁ <WH7969> Three פְּעָמִ֖ים <WH6471> times בַּשָּׁנָ֑ה <WH8141> in the year יֵרָאֶה֙ <WH7200> appear כָּל־ <WH3605> all זְכ֣וּרְךָ֔ <WH2138> shall all your men children אֶת־ <WH853> פְּנֵ֛י <WH6440> before הָֽאָדֹ֥ן ׀ <WH136> the Lord יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> GOD אֱלֹהֵ֥י <WH430> the God יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for אוֹרִ֤ישׁ <WH3423> For I will cast out גּוֹיִם֙ <WH1471> the nations מִפָּנֶ֔יךָ <WH6440> before וְהִרְחַבְתִּ֖י <WH7337> thee and enlarge אֶת־ <WH853> גְּבוּלֶ֑ךָ <WH1366> thy borders וְלֹא־ <WH3808> and no יַחְמֹ֥ד <WH2530> desire אִישׁ֙ <WH376> neither shall any man אֶֽת־ <WH853> אַרְצְךָ֔ <WH776> thy land בַּעֲלֹֽתְךָ֗ <WH5927> when thou shalt go up לֵרָאוֹת֙ <WH7200> to appear אֶת־ <WH853> פְּנֵי֙ <WH6440> before יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <WH430> thy God שָׁלֹ֥שׁ <WH7969> three פְּעָמִ֖ים <WH6471> times בַּשָּׁנָֽה׃ <WH8141> in the year

לֹֽא־ <WH3808> nor תִשְׁחַ֥ט <WH7819> Thou shalt not offer עַל־ <WH5921> with חָמֵ֖ץ <WH2557> with leaven דַּם־ <WH1818> the blood זִבְחִ֑י <WH2077> of my sacrifice וְלֹא־ <WH3808> nor יָלִ֣ין <WH3885> be left לַבֹּ֔קֶר <WH1242> unto the morning זֶ֖בַח <WH2077> neither shall the sacrifice חַ֥ג <WH2282> of the feast הַפָּֽסַח׃ <WH6453> of the passover

רֵאשִׁ֗ית <WH7225> The first בִּכּוּרֵי֙ <WH1061> of the firstfruits אַדְמָ֣תְךָ֔ <WH127> of thy land תָּבִ֕יא <WH935> thou shalt bring בֵּ֖ית <WH1004> unto the house יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֑יךָ <WH430> thy God לֹא־ <WH3808> shall not תְבַשֵּׁ֥ל <WH1310> Thou shalt not seethe גְּדִ֖י <WH1423> a kid בַּחֲלֵ֥ב <WH2461> milk אִמּֽוֹ׃ <WH517> in his mother's פ

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶׁ֔ה <WH4872> unto Moses כְּתָב־ <WH3789> Write לְךָ֖ אֶת־ <WH853> הַדְּבָרִ֣ים <WH1697> thou these words הָאֵ֑לֶּה <WH428> these כִּ֞י <WH3588> for עַל־ <WH5921> after פִּ֣י ׀ <WH6310> for after the tenor הַדְּבָרִ֣ים <WH1697> of these words הָאֵ֗לֶּה <WH428> these כָּרַ֧תִּי <WH3772> I have made אִתְּךָ֛ <WH854> for בְּרִ֖ית <WH1285> a covenant וְאֶת־ <WH854> and with יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> with thee and with Israel
